tool_description:
[Update 04 Feb 2024]: A new TLS engine is currently being deployed! CloudFlare has updated its TLS fingerprinting protection; therefore, we have upgraded the ScrapeNinja high-performance engine (/scrape) to meet the new challenge. If you have encountered 403 errors recently, please see https://rapidapi.com/restyler/api/scrapeninja/discussions/117971 .

High performance API for web scraping. Emulates Chrome TLS fingerprint, backed by rotating proxies (geos: US, EU, Brazil, France, Germany, 4g ...
name: ScrapeNinja
title: ScrapeNinja

api_list.name: /scrape (legacy)
api_list.description: Scrape via GET method. Not recommended for production, you'd better use POST requests.
